about_the_game:
WARNING: This video game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

Story:

In a quiet neighborhood, Jack Nicholson was brutally murdered. Jack and Doc, best friends and colleagues at Red Rose Asylum—a facility shrouded in secrecy—had heard the unsettling rumors about its dark experiments. These whispers have now turned deadly, leading to a string of murders that have shaken the community.

Prompted by a desperate message from Jack's wife, Doc begins his investigation at Jack's house, where he uncovers a terrifying truth hidden in the shadows. As he delves deeper, he realizes that the answers he seeks may be more dangerous than the killer stalking him.

Features:

  • True Survival Horror Experience: To Survive by running, hiding, or scavenging for items to fight back against the terror that awaits. Each encounter is a test of your wits and courage.

  • Light Mechanism: The killer can only strike in the dark. As the lights in each room fade slowly, the darkness becomes your greatest enemy. Light is your only ally—keep it close.

  • Unpredictable Enemies: The killer's attacks are unpredictable, keeping you constantly on edge. You never know when or where the next strike will come.

  • Real Horror: Experience the chilling atmosphere with immersive graphics and a tense environment that will keep you gripped with fear.

Continuous Updates:

We are committed to making Psycho as immersive as possible. Both the full game and the demo receive regular updates to enhance your experience. Your feedback is invaluable—report any bugs or suggest new features in our discussion section or connect with us through our social media channels. Your input helps shape the game!

short_description: Survival horror reaches new heights in Psycho. With detailed graphics and intense first-person action, play as Doc unraveling the dark secrets behind his friend's murder. A killer lurks in the shadows, and as the lights fade, survival becomes a desperate race against time.
